page.description: Enhanced application performance can be achieved in Android application using the Android Crosswalk Plugin for PhoneGap.

discussion.p: The Crosswalk Webview Engine plugin changes the default Webview to Crosswalk, which provides consistent, predictable behavior by reducing Android device fragmenation. Crosswalk uses the latest web innovations and APIs, providing a feature rich experience on all Android 4.0+ devices.
The NPM version of this plugin does *[NOT]* work with PhoneGap build. You must use one of the [CLI versions of PhoneGap] in order for this plugin to be enabled.

item.name: Consistent WebView that doesn't change based on device/Android version
Enhanced capabilities: Adds WebRTC, WebAudio and Web Components
Increased size on disk when installed (about 50MB)
Crosswalk WebView stores data (IndexedDB, LocalStorage, etc) separately from System WebView
